intent_atoms.description: Provide a command-line interface for exporting data in JSON format and binary capture format via the isoinspector export subcommands.
The export json and export capture subcommands must be wired through ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment.parsePipeline and use shared exporters.
Default output paths, custom destinations, and failure propagation should behave like the legacy runner.
Export operations must always route through the shared streaming capture utilities to produce JSON trees and binary captures using the modern pipeline.

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorCLI export json command
functional_units.description: Exports data as a JSON tree using the shared streaming capture utilities

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorCLI export capture command
functional_units.description: Exports binary captures via the shared streaming capture utilities

functional_units.name: ArgumentParser subcommands for export operations
functional_units.description: Provides CLI subcommands to invoke export functionalities and parse pipelines

functional_units.name: Default output path handling
functional_units.description: Determines default destination paths for export outputs when none are specified

functional_units.name: Custom destination handling
functional_units.description: Allows users to specify custom file destinations for export outputs

functional_units.name: Error propagation in export commands
functional_units.description: Propagates failures from legacy runner to new streaming pipeline and reports errors
